first_para: David Lindon Lammy, FRSA (born 19 July 1972) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Tottenham since 2000.

full.extract:
David Lindon Lammy, FRSA (born 19 July 1972) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Tottenham since 2000.
^ http://www.davidlammy.co.uk/da/15560
^ List of members' Interests, Cabinet Office, March 2009.
full.title: David Lammy
